attributes.title: A 90s Zombie Story - Let's Roll Presents: Unruly Rollers
attributes.caption: The Achievement Hunters break out their d20s and give role playing a try in the game Kids on Bikes. This story takes place in a zombie filled mall. Will our heroes make it out undead or alive?
attributes.description: The Achievement Hunters break out their d20s and give role playing a try in the game Kids on Bikes. This story takes place in a zombie filled mall. Will our heroes make it out undead or alive?
